channel.description: Recent content in compile on Fresh Swift

item.title: Turning Swift compile-time safety into safety for your users
item.description: Oleg Dreyman shows us how we can take advantage of Swiftâ€™s compiler to ensure we always ask the user for confirmation before performing destructive actions on their data.

item.title: Speed up Swift compile time
item.description: Dejan Atanasov provides some tips to speed up Swift compile times. He looks at changes we can make to Xcode project configuration, together with changes to how we write our Swift code.
